verbose_text: In most human cancers, CK1 isoforms, especially CK1alpha, delta, epsilon, may have oncogenic functions by phosphorylating p53 and mdm2, influencing beta-catenin stability, inhibiting apoptosis, and by regulating microtubule stability and centrosome specific functions XREF_BIBR.
evidence: CK1 isoforms, especially CK1alpha, delta, epsilon, may have oncogenic functions by phosphorylating p53
